review: this is tickling my brain in all the right ways
such a cute and enjoyable game it is like the fantasy when i was a little kid playing my toys in my room all came into life if you sometimes miss your childhood this might be a good game for you
fun to 100

a fun cutesy pikmin inspired puzzle platformer i would gladly play another game of its ilk i would heartily recommend it to anyone really the movement is great the aesthetic is fun and you ought to find something to like  it does lack a key quality of life feature in there is no way other than brute force to track down any missing collectables a solid 2hrs of my playthrough was spent looking for one pickup in a back corner of the biggest map in the game
great game if you like games like pikmin and are looking for an alternative on pc this is your game

what a pleasure it was to finish this game something i rarely do anymore absolutely worth whatever i paid for it quality gameplay through and through perfect way to let your brain turn off for a while

pikmin with a gorgeous art style and brilliant level design wish the devs would create a sequel the story is pretty solid and has an emotional punch towards the end no bosses which i appreciate from time to time for a casual chill experience after work overall if youre a platforming fan and appreciate creative direction youll love this game oh and the camera is actually well done in this unlike most platformers
didnt even think i liked 3d platformers until i played this didnt even think i had ocd until i finished collecting every single thing in the game  1010

this game is super adorable and i really love it im so happy i got it during the summer sale its such a cute cozy and casual puzzle game with these adorable 2d characters in a 3d world the art style totally convinced me to buy it and now i want plushies of these characters
charming and imaginative its a bit more chibirobo than pikmin but its got enough puzzling and platforming to keep you locked in for 6 hours
great quick game
this was absolutely adorable and great fun one of the only games in a long time ive had the compulsion to 100 there are no consequences to failure  just try again

chill game i like it

i never write reviews but i have to for this game  this is one of my favorite games of all time its fun the controls are wonderful everything feels snappy and it doesnt overstay its welcome im on my third playthrough and i guess there will be a few more its just one of those collectathon platformers that give you a wonderful feeling  if anyone knows any other games that scratch this tinykinitch let me know

this game is an absolute blast to enjoy i highly reccomend anyone who like super mario 64 or pikmin or any other collectathon games to play this masterpiece the only gripes that i had with this game was that there was no double jump or way to see where you missed any collectibles but one i have only beaten the second area at the time im writing this and those would be superficial additions anyways
1010 will 100 the game again in a few years
good game

lovely game with beautiful graphics  the platinum trophy was a bit grindy out of my 114 hours of play six were spent looking for specific hidden items its a great game nonetheless i love how optimized it is

what an amazing platformer its absolutely adorable the movement although it is pretty simplistic feels just right and i really loved the levelmission design as well  everything just flows together really smoothly and its not needlessly difficult to complete everything in an area

this game is filled with joy and character i see myself waiting for a sequel hopefully coming sooner than later the platforming is precise and fast enough this could honestly rival some of the greats in gameplay and art direction well worth playing 910

the bold simplicity of banjo kazooie collectathon combined with pikmin that will never get attacked by enemies there are none and never need you to ensure their safety ive had my eye on this game since the demo and got it for 5 on sale great deal

the perfect game milo and his friends are super cute i have finished this game and i like every level but i faced with some bugs achievements i know that these problems existed before and are still not fixed   for some reason 4 of the achievements with collecting tinykins mails candles and bottles have not been completed although i have collected everything 100  but overall the game is perfect i recommend to play sadly that i cant complete the game 100

this is a cool game it takes a nifty concept and expands on it the animation is cute and the bugs are really cool looking it isnt a particularly difficult game but the experience is good and i had fun it would have been nice to get a postcomplete goldkin finder  i missed one kin in a level and that makes me sad  but they arent super necessary also it has some fun references i definitely noticed several but the only one that comes to mind now is the avatar the last airbender hornets

deserves a spot in the collectathon hall of fame its an ncredible game with great worldbuilding social commentary enjoyable plot and dialogues a beautiful artstyle and it allows for amazing movement and speedrun tech at around 7 hours to 100 at least for me it boasts interesting enough level layouts to warrant going back through each room of the house to collect everything you might have missed while usually not being much of a slog to do definite recommend

nice collection game with good traversal mechanics once you beat the game make sure to quickly visit every room in the same session to make sure the achievements trigger properly also you dont have to do the races they dont count towards achievements

absolutely loved this game what a hidden gem so much whimsy charm and personality in this fun lil adventure really brought me back to the joyous feelings of discovery i felt while playing 3d collectathon platformers as a kid highly recommend it was very satisfying and rewarding to get 100 of the achievements
